nodes.text: The Battle of Nym's Factory Compound occurred in Nym's Factory Compound on Lok in 1 ABY.
The droid bounty hunter IG-88 had set up production of droids for its droid army in the compound and a group of spacers came to shut things down.

As the spacers entered the compound, a number of exploding B1-Series battle droids confronted them in the entrance, but were defeated. The spacers pushed on and faced down two waves of four gold droidekas. The spacers then faced a serious threat, from B1s equipped with flamethrowers, to MSE-6-series repair droids that targeted their artillery barrages. Eventually the spacers prevailed again and defeated the droids.

The spacers had a final showdown with the IG-88 droid commanding the facility, which was armed with a blaster and a flamethrower and fought ferociously. Ultimately though, it was defeated and the factory was shut down.
The remains of the IG-88 droid were presumably recovered and repaired by IG-88's droid army, as all four IG-88 droids were known to have been sighted at later dates.
The Battle of Nym's Factory Compound featured in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and was one of the 'Heroic Encounters' that were introduced to the game in Chapter 7 in November 2007.
